Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Mark Carter
Dear Sir,
Mark Carter has nothing more to prove at AA Maui Whalers!
He has an AVG of .410 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

should demote him before he gets burned.
